metadata.name: The Salt Collection | #001
metadata.description:
The Salt Collection is a photography project by Chris Bacarella based on Land Speed Racing at the Bonneville Salt Flats, in Utah, USA. The Collection is a series of 10 images, each being released after the first is sold. 

The project was created to raise funds for future photography projects with 5% of all proceeds going to the Save the Salt Foundation, a nonprofit organization whose mission is to protect the Bonneville Salt Flats in Utah and to promote its history and motorsports legacy
